  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig

    @WebServlet(description="Semantic sessionless: spreadsheet",
            urlPatterns="/sheet.less")
public class CurriculumBookTier
extends io.odysz.semantic.jserv.ServPort<io.oz.spreadsheet.SpreadsheetReq>
    Example & test for Spreadsheet. AnClient.js test: sessionless workbook DESIGN NOTE As Semantier pattern don't try to abstract CRUD pattern further more, This class is only handling requests of MyCurriculum workbook.
    Author:
    odys-z@github.com
    See Also:
